padding--r-none.title: No right padding
padding--r-none.description: Removes all padding from the right.

padding--r-xs.title: Tiny right padding
padding--r-xs.description: Adds a tiny amount of padding to the right.

padding--r-sm.title: Small right padding
padding--r-sm.description: Adds a small amount of padding to the right.

padding--r-md.title: Medium right padding
padding--r-md.description: Adds a medium amount of padding to the right.

padding--r-lg.title: Large right padding
padding--r-lg.description: Adds a large amount of padding to the right.

padding--r-xl.title: Extra-large right padding
padding--r-xl.description: Adds an extra-large amount of padding to the right.

padding--r-xxl.title: Double-extra-large right padding
padding--r-xxl.description: Adds a double-extra-large amount of padding to the right.
